string.value: Since my last job, I got a strange spirit named #r#q1321007##k. For a spirit, it doesn't have any special powers but I just kept him with me. But supposedly #b#p2081100##k knows about a special blessing power that this spirit has...
#p2081100# said #q1321007# has great power that simply needs to be awakened. He told me to go see #b#p2041023##k if I want to awaken his power.
#p2041023# seems to know how to use #q1321007#'s power.
Long time no see. You need to have something extra even if you completed the 4th job advancement. What am I talking about? I'm asking you if you need magic to give you more power.

You seem to be puzzled. Don't worry. #r#q1321007##k, the spirit that is within you, will learn the magic skills, not you. It used to be a spirit of a wicked man, but it has since been purified and is a pure spirit now. You can awaken his power...
#q1321007# has power called #bblessing power#k. This magic will give more power to those who seek it. Are you curious? #q1321007#'s power will become your power. No harm in having it.
Then go to see the magician, #b#p2041023##k standing in #b#m220050300##k. He would know about the history of #r#q1321007##k.
Hmm.. If you don't want to, then that's fine. Take care of #q1321007#!
You came all the way to #m220050300#! Did you come to see #p2041023#'s magic? I'm willing to show......No? You are the one #p2081100# talked about! Can you show your spirit?
Ah, this is #q1321007#. He used to be bad. He looks cute without his memories...
